summary.span: 将鼠标设备表示为特定线程。

span.span: Represents the mouse device to a specific thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供鼠标相关的事件，方法和属性，提供有关鼠标状态的信息。The class provides mouse related events, methods and, properties which provide information regarding the state of the mouse. 每个事件的定义为附加的事件还会重新显示由基元素类和作为新的路由事件。Each event that defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes and as a new routed event. 通常情况下，它是更方便地处理的应用程序的鼠标事件并，而不是使用事件。Generally, it is more convenient to handle mouse events for an application on and , rather than using the events. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 静态成员主类委托的调用线程的输入管理器。The static members of the class delegate to the primary of the calling thread's input manager.

summary.span: 将鼠标输入捕获到指定元素。

span.span: Captures mouse input to the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 如果未指定，默认值是。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果捕获了鼠标时或引发事件，并输入不会转入下鼠标，元素和首先引发。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 这使捕获的元素在有机会释放之前捕获和事件进行路由。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以由多个元素组成。Controls can be composed of multiple elements. 报告在鼠标指针位于复合控件和控件本身的特定元素。 reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself. 例如，具体取决于哪一部分鼠标指针位于属性可报告的属性或。For example, depending on which part of a the pointer is over, the property could report the of the property or the . 使用上的属性和以确定鼠标是否位于元素，其中包括其可视子元素或控件复合元素。Use the property on and to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements. 如果元素具有鼠标捕获，鼠标指针被视为直接通过该元素中，无论在鼠标指针位于。If an element has mouse capture, the mouse pointer is considered directly over the element regardless of the where the mouse pointer is.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标指针的位置计算相对于指定元素与元素可为 0，0 原点的点的左上角。The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified element with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0. 在拖放操作期间鼠标的位置无法可靠地确定通过。During drag-and-drop operations, the position of the mouse cannot be reliably determined through . 这是因为在放置操作完成，其中许多由基础控制的行为之前，鼠标 （可能包括捕获） 的控制由拖动源元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]调用。This is because control of the mouse (possibly including capture) is held by the originating element of the drag until the drop is completed, with much of the behavior controlled by underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] calls. 改为尝试以下方法：Try the following approaches instead: - 调用方法传递给拖动事件 (， ， )。Call the method of the that is passed to the drag events (, , ). - 调用[GetCursorPos](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp)，使用 P/Invoke。Call [GetCursorPos](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp), using P/Invoke. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以确定鼠标指针的位置。The following example shows how to use to determine the position of the mouse pointer. 鼠标指针的位置存储在结构。The position of the mouse pointer is stored in a structure. 并的值中显示对象。The and values of the object are displayed in a . [!code-csharp[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsPositionMouse](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouserelatedsnippetspositionmouse)] [!code-vb[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsPositionMouse](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouserelatedsnippetspositionmouse)]

summary.span: 在元素捕获到鼠标时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an element captures the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 由于浮升路由，因此具有捕获的实际元素可能是子元素，不一定实际附加事件处理程序的元素。Because of the bubbling routing, the actual element that has capture might be a child element, not necessarily the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查在事件自变量以确定实际元素具有鼠标捕获。Check the in the event arguments to determine the actual element that has mouse capture. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event.

summary.span: 标识 附加事件。

span.span: Identifies the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. TT 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 由于浮升路由，因此丢失捕获的实际元素可能是子元素，不一定实际附加事件处理程序的元素。Because of the bubbling routing, the actual element that lost capture might be a child element, not necessarily the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件参数以确定实际失去捕获的元素中。Check the in the event arguments to determine the actual element that lost capture. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定已按下哪个鼠标按钮，检查中的属性传递给处理程序。To determine which mouse button was depressed, check the property in the passed to the handler. 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] Framework 基于此附加事件的公开为两个不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件并:和。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework builds on this attached event by surfacing it as two different [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events on and : and . 这些实现可处理基础事件和读取事件以确定是否涉及鼠标左键或右键按钮的参数。These implementations handle the underlying event and read the arguments of the event to determine whether the left or right mouse button was involved. 对于三个按钮的鼠标，没有框架级别事件支持的中心按钮。For a three-button mouse, there is no framework-level event support for the center button. 应使用事件并检查状态在事件自变量。You should use the event and check the state in the event arguments. > [!IMPORTANT] > 少量派生的类具有类似控件的行为，例如， ，可能会具有固有的鼠标按钮事件处理的类。A few derived classes that have control-like behavior, for example, , might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 鼠标左键按下事件是最有可能的事件，以便使类处理在控件中。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 类通常处理标记基础为已处理的类事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦该事件标记为已处理，其他实例处理程序附加到该元素通常不会引发。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 通常也不会引发的任何其他类或实例处理程序附加到针对 UI 树的根节点的浮升方向中的元素。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解决的问题，在前面的重要说明中所述和仍接收鼠标左键按下具有类处理通过使用这些解决方案的派生类上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important note and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加处理程序未标记为已由控件处理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 请注意，由于这是预览事件，该路由从根开始，隧道下行控件。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 虽然通过调用注册该控件上的处理程序，然后选择使处理程序以侦听事件，即使它们已标记为已处理路由的事件数据中的签名选项。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. 对于与鼠标相关的路由事件，请谨慎如何或何时将它们标记为已处理。For routed events that relate to the mouse, be careful about how or when you mark them handled. 做出适当选择是否的父元素应该还会通知有关任何给定鼠标操作实际上就是为什么的困难[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework 选择作为基础的路由的鼠标事件的模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]路由事件。The difficulty in making the appropriate choices about whether parent elements should also be informed about any given mouse action is in fact why the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework chose the model of having the underlying mouse routed event be surfaced as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] events along the route. 使用隧道的鼠标事件，存在类似的问题。Similar issues exist with tunneling mouse events. 您应处理事件并不希望其由源，方向进一步子级和该影响组合的情况下，可能希望组成成分的控件如何鼠标行为？Should you handle the event and not have it be handled by further children toward the source, and how would that affect compositing a control where the compositing pieces might have expected mouse behaviors? ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 此事件使用直接事件处理路由策略。This event uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不会引发在路由过程 （而仅在其引发它们的同一元素中处理）。Direct routed events are not raised along a route (they are only handled in the same element on which they are raised). 它们，但是，启用了路由的事件的行为，例如在样式中的事件触发的其他方面。They do, however, enable other aspects of routed event behaviors, such as event triggers in styles. 虽然此事件用于跟踪当鼠标进入某个元素，它还会报告属性已从`false`到`true`此元素上。Although this event is used to track when the mouse enters an element, it is also reporting the property has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 此事件使用直接事件处理路由策略。This event uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不遵循的路由 （而仅在其引发它们的同一元素中处理）。Direct routed events do not follow a route (they are only handled in the same element on which they are raised). 它们，但是，启用了路由的事件的行为，例如在样式中的事件触发的其他方面。They do, however, enable other aspects of routed event behaviors, such as event triggers in styles. 虽然此事件用于跟踪当鼠标离开某个元素时，它还会报告属性值已从`true`到`false`此元素上。Although this event is used to track when the mouse leaves an element, it is also reporting that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过检查事件的参数来确定哪个鼠标按钮释放了。Which mouse button was released is determined by checking the arguments of the event. 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] Framework 基于此附加事件的公开为两个不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件:和。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework builds on this attached event by surfacing it as two different [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events on : and . 这些实现可处理基础事件和读取事件以确定是否涉及鼠标左键或右键按钮的参数。These implementations handle the underlying event and read the arguments of the event to determine whether the left or right mouse button was involved. 为三个按钮没有框架级别事件支持针对中间按钮，并且应使用事件并检查是否有中心按钮在事件条件参数。For three-button, there is no framework-level event support for the center button, and you should use the event and check for the center button condition in the event arguments. 对于与鼠标相关的路由事件，请谨慎如何或何时将它们标记为已处理。For routed events that relate to the mouse, be careful about how or when you mark them handled. 做出适当选择是否的父元素应该还会通知有关任何给定鼠标操作实际上就是为什么的困难[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework 选择使基础模型路由的事件作为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]所有路由事件。The difficulty in making the appropriate choices about whether parent elements should also be informed about any given mouse action is in fact why the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework chose the model of having the underlying routed event be surfaced as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] events all along the route. 使用隧道的鼠标事件，存在类似的问题。Similar issues exist with tunneling mouse events. 您应处理事件并不希望其由子项进一步向源和其中组成成分可能具有预期的控件中该影响组合如何鼠标行为？Should you handle the event and not have it be handled by children further towards the source, and how would that affect compositing in a control where the compositing pieces might have expected mouse behaviors? ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is .

summary.span: 标识 附加事件。

span.span: Identifies the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

summary.span: 在鼠标滚轮转动时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse wheel is rotated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于在鼠标指针位于其中。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is. 如果您收到此事件的已设定焦点或捕获的元素，鼠标指针可能实际上是另一个元素上时。If you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might in fact be over another element at the time. 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is .

summary.span: 代表鼠标滚轮要滚过一行而转动的单位数。

span.span: Represents the number of units the mouse wheel is rotated to scroll one line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在当前[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，此字段的值为 120。In the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], the value of this field is 120. 公开此字段的目的是为了让供应商来构建可以更好地解析鼠标滚轮在将来，可能包括不带齿格自由地旋转滚轮。The intention of the field exposure is to allow for vendors to build finer-resolution mouse wheels in the future, that perhaps would include a freely rotating wheel without notches. 预期结果是此类设备将在每个邮件中发送更多消息，每次旋转，但具有较小的值。The expectation is that such a device would send more messages per rotation, but with a smaller value in each message. 若要支持这种可能性，应添加到传入的增量值量达到 （因此，对于增量旋转您获取相同的响应），或者滚动以响应更频繁的消息的一部分行。To support this possibility, you should either add the incoming delta values until the amount is reached (so for a delta-rotation you get the same response), or scroll partial lines in response to the more frequent messages. 也可以选择自己滚动粒度并累积您自己选择的增量数据，直到该增量，达到时，或可能是引用鼠标灵敏度的用户可以控制系统参数并推断其与鼠标滚轮增量阈值。You could also choose your own scroll granularity and accumulate deltas of your own choosing until that delta is reached, or perhaps reference user-controllable system parameters for mouse sensitivity and extrapolate these to mouse wheel delta thresholds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的是设置为将应用于整个应用程序。The that is set to will be applied to the whole application. 若要清除重写，将到`null`。To clear the override , set to `null`. 设置到将强制鼠标光标不显示，但仍会处理鼠标事件。Setting to will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序用于切换的单个元素和整个应用程序之间的光标更改作用域。The following example shows an event handler for a that is used to toggle the scope of a cursor change between a single element and the entire application. 如果控件引发事件`rbScopeElement` ，设置一个标志，指示范围的游标更改并设置为`null`。If the control that raised the event is the `rbScopeElement`, a flag that denotes the scope of the cursor change is set and is set to `null`. 如果控件引发事件`rbScopeApplication` ，设置一个标志，指示范围的光标更改并设置为属性控件命名为`DisplayArea`。If the control that raised the event is the `rbScopeApplication`, a flag that denotes the scope of the cursor change is set and is set to the property of the control named `DisplayArea`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 按下哪个鼠标按钮的是通过检查事件的参数来确定的。Which mouse button was depressed is determined by checking the arguments of the event. 这是一个附加的事件 （使用隧道的路由策略），用于通过附加的事件语法来引用现有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]接受输入的元素。This is an attached event (using tunneling routing strategy) that is intended through attached event syntax to be referenced by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements that take input. 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] Framework 基于此附加事件的公开为两个不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件:和。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework builds on this attached event by surfacing it as two different [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events on : and . 这些实现可处理基础事件和读取事件以确定是否涉及鼠标左键或右键按钮的参数。These implementations handle the underlying event and read the arguments of the event to determine whether the left or right mouse button was involved. 为三个按钮没有框架级别事件支持针对中间按钮，并且应使用事件并检查是否有中心按钮在事件条件参数。For three-button, there is no framework-level event support for the center button, and you should use the event and check for the center button condition in the event arguments. 对于与鼠标相关的路由事件，请谨慎如何或何时将它们标记为已处理。For routed events that relate to the mouse, be careful about how or when you mark them handled. 处理根附近的事件和处理的下一代子级源方向可能不适合的复合控件，其中可能具有组成成分预期鼠标行为。Handling the event near the root and handling it by a child further toward the source may not be appropriate for composited controls, where the compositing pieces might have expected mouse behaviors. 做出适当选择是否其他元素应通知有关任何给定鼠标操作实际上就是为什么的难点[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework 选择使基础模型路由的事件作为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]路由事件。The difficulty in making the appropriate choices about whether other elements should also be informed about any given mouse action is in fact why the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework chose the model of having the underlying routed event be surfaced as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] events along the route. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 相应的浮升事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is .

[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 基元素上不重新呈现此事件。This event is not resurfaced on base elements. 它是意义的主要尝试协调鼠标捕获和在其控件合成的鼠标输入的控件创作者。It is mainly of concern to control authors that are attempting to reconcile mouse capture and mouse input within their control compositing. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate||

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过检查事件的参数来确定哪个鼠标按钮释放了。Which mouse button was released is determined by checking the arguments of the event. 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] Framework 基于此附加事件的公开为两个不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件:和。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework builds on this attached event by surfacing it as two different [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events on : and . 这些实现可处理基础事件和读取事件以确定是否涉及鼠标左键或右键按钮的参数。These implementations handle the underlying event and read the arguments of the event to determine whether the left or right mouse button was involved. 为三个按钮没有框架级别事件支持针对中间按钮，并且应使用事件并检查是否有中心按钮在事件条件参数。For three-button, there is no framework-level event support for the center button, and you should use the event and check for the center button condition in the event arguments. 对于与鼠标相关的路由事件，请谨慎如何或何时将它们标记为已处理。For routed events that relate to the mouse, be careful about how or when you mark them handled. 处理根附近事件并不处理的下一代子级源方向可能不适合的复合控件，其中可能具有组成成分预期鼠标行为。Handling the event near the root and not handling by a child further toward the source may not be appropriate for composited controls, where the compositing pieces might have expected mouse behaviors. 做出适当选择是否其他元素应通知有关任何给定鼠标操作实际上就是为什么的难点[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework 选择使基础模型路由的事件作为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]路由事件。The difficulty in making the appropriate choices about whether other elements should also be informed about any given mouse action is in fact why the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework chose the model of having the underlying routed event be surfaced as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] events along the route. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 相应的浮升事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is .

summary.span: 标识 附加事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是从根本上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用可以不定义该事件的对象处理的事件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]了扩展，从而也要遍历路由的事件。Attached events are fundamentally a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept for referencing events that can be handled on objects that do not define that event, which [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] expands upon by also enabling the event to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, you use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). 基元素上不重新呈现此事件。This event is not resurfaced on base elements. 它是意义的主要尝试协调鼠标捕获和在其控件合成的鼠标输入的控件创作者。It is mainly of concern to control authors that are attempting to reconcile mouse capture and mouse input within their control compositing. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有相应的浮升事件。There is no corresponding bubbling event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于在鼠标指针位于其中;因此，如果您收到此事件的已设定焦点或捕获的元素，鼠标指针可能实际上是另一个元素上时。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might in fact be over another element at the time. 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在设置光标不适用于任何特定的元素，但它而不是适用于整个应用程序。The cursor being set does not apply to any particular element, but rather it applies to the whole application. 因此，如果后设置鼠标指针移动到的对象设置光标的光标，光标将再次更改。So, if after setting the cursor the mouse pointer moves over an object which sets the cursor, the cursor will be changed again. 若要强制鼠标指针指向特定以及强制这上的所有元素，设置属性。To force the mouse pointer to a specific and to force this on all elements, set the property. 若要设置特定元素的光标，请使用上的属性或。To set the cursor on a specific element, use the property on either or . 有关基元素的详细信息，请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see the [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).
